com.apigee.flow.execution

Class ExecutionResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apigee.flow.execution.ExecutionResult

  • public class ExecutionResult
extends java.lang.Object

    The ExecutionResult class provides methods that let you customize the content and headers for the error response returned to the client.

    Example: Use ExecutionResult to return custom error message and headers.

    public class JavaError implements Execution {

    public ExecutionResult execute(MessageContext messageContext, ExecutionContext executionContext) {

        try {

            // Code that may throw an error. 

            return ExecutionResult.SUCCESS;

        } catch (RuntimeException ex) {

            ExecutionResult executionResult = new ExecutionResult(false, Action.ABORT);

            //--Returns custom error message and header
            executionResult.setErrorResponse(ex.getMessage());
            executionResult.addErrorResponseHeader("ExceptionClass", ex.getClass().getName());

            return executionResult;
        }
    }
}
